forum.content:
Take it slow, but it's not typical 慢慢來 這並不常見
He already knows that my love is fire 他已經知道我如炙火般的愛
His heart was a stone, but then his hands roam他的心如同石頭 他的手漫遊
I turned him to gold and it took him higher我將他化為黃金 讓他情緒更加狂歡

Oh, I'll be your daydream, I'll wear your favorite things噢 我將變成你的美夢 我將穿戴上你的最愛
We could be beautiful 我們是如此美麗
Get drunk on the good life, I'll take you to paradise 喝醉在這美好的生活 我將帶你進入仙境
Say you'll never let me go說你將永遠不離開我

Deep in my bones, I can feel you 我能感受你深藏在我的骨頭裡 
Take me back to a time only we and you帶我回到只有我和你的時光
Hideaway 躲藏
We could waste the night with an old film我們可以看舊影集浪費一晚
Smoke a little weed on the couch in the back room屋裡坐在沙發上抽著菸草
Hideaway躲藏
Say you'll never let me go說你將永遠不離開我
Say you'll never let me go說你將永遠不離開我
